title: How We Completed a Massive Kafka and Cassandra Migration
author: Ben Slater
description: A look at the strategy and process, along with some best practices to make any large-scale, mission-critical Cassandra and Kafka migration go smoother.
cntitle: 如何完成大规模 Kafka 和 Cassandra 迁移
cndescription: 了解策略和流程，以及一些最佳实践，让任何大规模、关键任务的 Cassandra 和 Kafka 迁移更加顺利。
